snippet.title: Zombie Slapper Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the Early Access release of Zombie Slapper!

Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2154350/Zombie_Slapper/

Zombie Slapper is a Wave-Based Zombie Survival where the goal is to survive as many waves as possible. You have super human slapping abilities and can send zombies flying with your hand cannon. As you progress through rounds, you can improve your characters stats and unlock new attacks and abilities. You have powerful ultimates that can be used to wipe out hordes of zombies and there are various power-ups around the map to give you an edge. Zombies get faster and more powerful as rounds increase and harder enemies will spawn as you progress. How many rounds can you survive?

What's included in its current state:

- Zombie Town map with 5 areas to explore and a boss fight.
- Player progression to include an exp system, perk cards and more.
- Full controller support.
- Character customization.
- Multiple attacks to include base attacks, ultimates, and traps.
- 3 zombie types.
- Power-ups and stat points to assign in game to make your character stronger.

Discord: https://discord.gg/f2c8yC3SgB
